mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (email, password, name, phone_number, address_code, address_detail) VALUES(#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{addressCode}, #{addressDetail})
mapper.select: SELECT id, email, name, password, phone_number, address_code, address_detail FROM user WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, email, name, password, phone_number, address_code, address_detail FROM user WHERE email=#{email}
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM user WHERE email=#{email}) AS success;
SELECT id, email, name, password, phone_number, address_code, address_detail FROM user WHERE email=#{email} AND password=#{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name = #{name}, password = #{password}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, address_code = #{addressCode}, address_detail = #{addressDetail} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user WHERE email=#{email} AND password=#{password}
